casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Scott HAMILTON. No. 124PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hamilton, Michael Scott. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Valerie Mitchell Asbell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of December 2015 by Defendant in the Alternative, for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Dismissed without prejudice by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
